thread.title: Winner App Lab Launches 40-Video Tutorial Course on Mobile App Marketing Success
thread.title_full: Winner App Lab Launches 40-Video Tutorial Course on Mobile App Marketing Success

title: Winner App Lab Launches 40-Video Tutorial Course on Mobile App Marketing Success
text: Winner App Lab Launches 40-Video Tutorial Course on Mobile App Marketing Success , 13 October 2015 -- The company has announced the launch of a video app marketing course, driven by the expertise of Alex Genadinik and many years of experience in the app field.October 2, 2015 – Winner App Lab has officially unveiled a 40-video course teaching how to market and profit from mobile apps. Alex Genadinik, and high-end professional and software developer, narrates the course and digs into his years of app development experience. Every tutorial is based on real-world experience in the field. Rather than having to read PDF files, the app training videos help understand many key subjects. Topics include how to effectively market an app at no cost, protect your ideas, and outsource operations to reduce expenses. The course also covers how to make an app go viral. It reveals the importance of keeping the same developer and how one can market a free app and still profit. Mobile app ideas and how to find them are explained. There’s also an explanation of upsales and the function of Android and iTunes engines. Ranking high in app listings increases sales, so this information is extremely useful to the serious app developer. A lot of information is included about starting a mobile app store and a successful business. All of the videos in the app course are professionally made, with each concept well-illustrated with screenshots and graphics. The complete course is available for $77.00. A 20% coupon code is available by clicking on the Facebook button on the website. In addition, a 30% coupon code can be obtained by clicking on the Share or Reddit buttons. For anyone who wants to know how mobile apps are actually made, these app video tutorials provide insightful answers and details. Customers can enter coupon codes to save. Purchasing and savings are available on the company’s website. The app training videos in the complete course can be obtained at http://www.winnerapplab.com/ . About Winner App Lab Winner App Lab is an app development and marketing company built on years of experience in the industry. Its initial product launch is a series of 40 training videos that explain app marketing and selling from a high-end, professional software developer. ###
